alert.note: Alert for Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 3:11AM MST until February 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 to 12 inches at Marias Pass, with 2 to 4 inches possible for lower elevations. Winds may gust over 60 mph at times Sunday night and Monday morning. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads and difficult travel. Blowing snow can significantly reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
